translations: 狼吞虎咽地吃；如饥似渴地阅读，热切地看；吞噬，毁灭；充满（感情）

sentences.sentence: The dogs come and devour the bacon.
Passing the pangolin around like a football, inquisitive lions spent hours trying to devour the armor-plated creature.
sentences.translation: 好奇的狮子们把穿山甲像足球一样传来传去，花了好几个小时试图吃掉这个被盔甲包裹的生物。

sentences.sentence: A medium-sized dog will devour at least one can of food plus biscuits per day.
sentences.translation: 一只中等大小的狗每天至少要干掉一罐食物外加饼干。
